mn145:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn145:1.3: Atha kho ayasma punno sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma punno bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn145:2.1: “sadhu mam, bhante, bhagava sankhittena ovadena ovadatu, yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
mn145:2.2: “Tena hi, punna, sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
mn145:2.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma punno bhagavato paccassosi.
mn145:3.1: “Santi kho, punna, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
mn145:3.2: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
mn145:3.3: Tassa tam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato uppajjati nandi.
mn145:3.9: manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
mn145:3.10: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
mn145:3.11: Tassa tam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato uppajjati nandi.
mn145:4.1: Santi ca kho, punna, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
mn145:4.2: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati.
mn145:4.3: Tassa tam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato nandi nirujjhati.
mn145:4.5: Santi ca kho, punna, sotavinneyya sadda …
mn145:4.9: manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
mn145:4.10: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati.
mn145:4.11: Tassa tam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato nandi nirujjhati.
mn145:5.1: Imina ca tvam, punna, maya sankhittena ovadena ovadito katarasmim janapade viharissasi”ti?
mn145:5.2: “Iminaham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena ovadena ovadito, atthi sunaparanto nama janapado, tatthaham viharissami”ti.
mn145:5.5: Sace tam, punna, sunaparantaka manussa akkosissanti paribhasissanti, tattha te, punna, kinti bhavissati”ti?
mn145:5.6: “Sace mam, bhante, sunaparantaka manussa akkosissanti paribhasissanti, tattha me evam bhavissati:
mn145:5.7: ‘bhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, subhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, yam me nayime panina paharam denti’ti.
mn145:5.10: “Sace pana te, punna, sunaparantaka manussa panina paharam dassanti, tattha pana te, punna, kinti bhavissati”ti?
mn145:5.11: “Sace me, bhante, sunaparantaka manussa panina paharam dassanti, tattha me evam bhavissati:
mn145:5.12: ‘bhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, subhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, yam me nayime ledduna paharam denti’ti.
mn145:5.15: “Sace pana te, punna, sunaparantaka manussa ledduna paharam dassanti, tattha pana te, punna, kinti bhavissati”ti?
mn145:5.16: “Sace me, bhante, sunaparantaka manussa ledduna paharam dassanti, tattha me evam bhavissati:
mn145:5.17: ‘bhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, subhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, yam me nayime dandena paharam denti’ti.
mn145:5.20: “Sace pana te, punna, sunaparantaka manussa dandena paharam dassanti, tattha pana te, punna, kinti bhavissati”ti?
mn145:5.21: “Sace me, bhante, sunaparantaka manussa dandena paharam dassanti, tattha me evam bhavissati:
mn145:5.22: ‘bhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, subhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, yam me nayime satthena paharam denti’ti.
mn145:5.25: “Sace pana te, punna, sunaparantaka manussa satthena paharam dassanti, tattha pana te, punna, kinti bhavissati”ti?
mn145:5.26: “Sace me, bhante, sunaparantaka manussa satthena paharam dassanti, tattha me evam bhavissati:
mn145:5.27: ‘bhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, subhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, yam mam nayime tinhena satthena jivita voropenti’ti.
mn145:5.30: “Sace pana tam, punna, sunaparantaka manussa tinhena satthena jivita voropessanti, tattha pana te, punna, kinti bhavissati”ti?
mn145:5.31: “Sace mam, bhante, sunaparantaka manussa tinhena satthena jivita voropessanti, tattha me evam bhavissati:
mn145:5.32: ‘santi kho bhagavato savaka kaye ca jivite ca attiyamana harayamana jigucchamana satthaharakam pariyesanti. Tam me idam apariyitthamyeva satthaharakam laddhan’ti.
mn145:6.2: Sakkhissasi kho tvam, punna, imina damupasamena samannagato sunaparantasmim janapade viharitum.
mn145:7.1: Atha kho ayasma punno bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya yena sunaparanto janapado tena carikam pakkami.
mn145:7.2: Anupubbena carikam caramano yena sunaparanto janapado tadavasari.
mn145:7.3: Tatra sudam ayasma punno sunaparantasmim janapade viharati.
mn145:7.4: Atha kho ayasma punno tenevantaravassena pancamattani upasakasatani pativedesi, tenevantaravassena pancamattani upasikasatani pativedesi, tenevantaravassena tisso vijja sacchakasi.
mn145:7.5: Atha kho ayasma punno aparena samayena parinibbayi.
mn145:8.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
mn145:8.2: “yo so, bhante, punno nama kulaputto bhagavata sankhittena ovadena ovadito so kalankato.
mn145:8.4: “Pandito, bhikkhave, punno kulaputto paccapadi dhammassanudhammam, na ca mam dhammadhikaranam vihethesi.
mn145:8.7: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
